page.title: 07Religion on Papa Westray
page.content: St Anns church is linked with Westray Parish Church. On Sunday the Church of Scotland minister, the Rev. David Dutton, crosses by boat to conduct the service. During the winter months when the sea is rough Rev. Dr.A.C.Dow, a retired minister who is resident on the island and has served the church for 60 years, takes the service. Hymn singing is held on a Sunday night and this is conducted by Mr J. Rendall. There is also a Gospel Hall in which members of the Bretheren hold their meetings, these are taken by lay preachers.
